title: 159: Ben Higgin’s Season Recap with 2 Black Girls, 1 Rose
itunes:title: 159: Ben Higgin’s Season Recap with 2 Black Girls, 1 Rose
description:
Jess recaps the latest Bachelor GOAT episode with Justine and Natasha of 2 Black Girls, 1 Rose! First they discuss Matt James becoming the new Bachelor and Justine and Natasha’s thoughts on ABC’s decision. Then they dive in Ben Higgin’s season aka the man who said 1,000 “I love you’s”. They chat The Twins, oh my lord Lace, Jubilee’s incredible story, Olivia’s cake tease, Caila’s Kevin Hart & Ice Cube date, Jojo’s love speech, Ben being the OG Pilot Pete, and much more! 
2 BLACK GIRLS, 1 ROSE: 
Get all their latest and bonus episodes here on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/2blackgirls1rose
***If you join their Patreon, you will get their latest episodes as they recap Jason Mesnik’s season!
Find past episodes on all platforms: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/2-black-girls-1-rose-a-bachelor-podcast/id1327196317
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/2blackgirls1rose/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/2blkgirls1rose?lang=en
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:
